meanings.sent1: She averts her gaze when she feels embarrassed.
meanings.sent2: He averts his eyes from the scary movie scenes.
meanings.sent3: The cat averts its attention to a passing bird outside.
meanings.sent4: The student averts her focus from the distracting noise.
meanings.sent5: The detective averts his suspicions from the innocent suspect.

meanings.definition: Prevent or ward off (an undesirable occurrence)
meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet averts head injuries during biking.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can avert many health problems.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella averts the raindrops from soaking her clothes.
meanings.sent4: The security system averts burglaries in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The vaccine averts the spread of the contagious disease.
